comp124graphics

Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • comp124graphics.GraphicsObject
      • comp124graphics.Rectangle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Colorable, FillColorable

    public class Rectangle
extends GraphicsObject
implements Colorable, FillColorable
    Represents a 2D rectangle that is drawn on the screen. Created by bjackson on 9/13/2016.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Rectangle(double x, double y, double width, double height)
      Constructor to create the rectangle object and initialize its instance variables.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle(double x,
                 double y,
                 double width,
                 double height)
        Constructor to create the rectangle object and initialize its instance variables. The default creates a rectangle at position x,y with the specified width and height. The rectangle is drawn with a 1 pixel black stroke outline by default.
        Parameters:
        x - position
        y - position
        width -
        height -
